dialogue: Wally, I want you to train our new hire.
The first thing you need to know is that we never use the DPX system when the MGB is down.
Hold your questions till the end.
You can use our PX4 to tunnel into the B9 data and produce a TMNP report.
But you'll need authorization from the LDG and the Micco.
I don't understand any of that.
I told you to hold your questions until the end.
Always remember to jost the prim-pram whenever the gip is fleeming toward Kilp.
Maybe I should ask someone else to train me.
